channel.title: The Web on The Encryption Compendium
channel.description: Recent content in The Web on The Encryption Compendium

item.title: Half the Web Is Now Encrypted. That Makes Everyone Safer
item.description: Published: January 2017 URL: https://www.wired.com/2017/01/half-web-now-encrypted-makes-everyone-safer/ Abstract: Computer security news is usually pretty dismal. But today the web got safer in a very important way.
